snippet: BLANK--Robert S. A terrible loss for all of us. Bob was a unique friend-affectionate, uncommonly generous and always wonderful company. We are fortunate to have so many memories in New York, Aspen, Connecticut and Rhode Island. Our love to Nancy and their wonderful children and grandchildren. Marilyn and Bill Frank 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLANK--Robert S. A terrible loss for all of us. Bob was a unique friend-affectionate, uncommonly generous and always wonderful company. We are fortunate to have so many memories in New York, Aspen, Connecticut and Rhode Island. Our love to Nancy and their wonderful children and grandchildren. Marilyn and Bill Frank 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLANK, ROBERT S
